description:
In this Excel For beginners course, you shall learn how to use Microsoft Excel 2013 from qualified instructors at Quant Master Academy   The Excel 2013 tutorial course is aimed at introducing you to Excel and take it to next advanced level. You shall be learning from very basic of how to create your worksheet. And then slowly we will be introducing advanced topics in excel like advanced formulas, sorting and filtering data in excel. You shall also be learning how to use SkyDrive and collaborate with other people in developing Excel Workbook.

 By the end of the Excel 2013 tutorial course, you shall be very comfortable in using Excel with a lot of ease. We shall be introducing lot of keyboard shortcuts as well to increase efficiency while working with Excel.

Take this Excel for beginners/intermediary course right now and learn Excel 2013.



Most of the functionality taught in this course is valid for Microsoft Excel 2007 and 2010 as well.
title: Microsoft Excel 2013 Simplified
